title: Centre woos Tesla and states gear suppliers
description: The southern state-widely regarded as an automotive and electronics manufacturing hub-already has some of Tesla's suppliers based there. This includes a European metal automotive component maker, which is looking to expand its existing operations,and a German manufacturer, which has a joint venture in Pune, manufacturing high performance rubber parts there.
